columns.dc:description: Name of the employee in post. A value of 'vacant' indicates that the role exists but is not presently filled, a value of 'n/a' indicates that the role no longer exists.
Title of the post held by the named employee.
Area within the council structure dealing with a particular activity that the post is assigned to.
Lowest amount the post holder can earn.
Highest amount the post holder can earn.
The main responsibilities of the post.
Amount received as benefits in kind.
Information regarding the benefits in kind received.
